stories.text:
It turns out that my Google Voice number, which I thought was ok, was expiring in late May. I followed directions to get it back, but the number is not listed as among the available ones. How can I retrieve it?

It's important, and Google would not be evil. (One thing they could do, is send a warning to the phone number it gets forwarded to. Also, maybe don't use "expire" and "be reclaimed" as synonyms? With domain names there is an intervening grace period.)

Is there anyone at Google who helps people? I don't mind paying.
stories.title: Ask HN: Google Voice number claimed? how can I get it back?
